channel.title: CSV on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in CSV on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: Model - CSV
item.description: Synposis A model for setting simulation signals with values read from a CSV file. Model Structure examples/csv └── sim ├── data │ └── simulation.yml └── model └── input └── lib/libcsv.so └── data └── model.yml └── valueset.csv <-- CSV File. CSV File Timestamp;A;B;C 0.0000;1.0;2.0;3.0 0.0005;-1.1;2.1;3.1 0.0010;1.2;-2.2;3.2 0.0015;1.3;2.3;-3.3 Examples Simulation / DSE Script {{readFile “script.md” chomp }} xxx ```hs simulation channel physical uses dse.modelc https://github.com/boschglobal/dse.modelc v2.1.32 model input dse.modelc.csv channel physical signal_channel envar CSV_FILE model/input/data/valueset.
